#summary Projects powered by the Java Wikipedia API (bliki engine).

= Powered by=
  * [http://solowiki.sourceforge.net/ SoloWiki] is a stand-alone editor designed to help Mediawiki users.
  * [http://www.codexwiki.org CodeXWiki] is a ColdFusion Enterprise Wiki 
  * [http://www.jamwiki.org JAMWiki.org] offers many of the features of [http://mediawiki.org/ Mediawiki] (for using the Bliki engine see [JAMWikiIntegration])
